snippet: The highly critical report on the C.I.A.’s detention and interrogation program is the most comprehensive review of the brutal treatment of Al Qaeda prisoners.
abstract: Senate Intelligence Committee approves highly critical, classified report on Central Intelligence Agency's detention and interrogation program; report is most comprehensive review of brutal treatment of Al Qaeda prisoners in years after Sept 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The highly critical report on the C.I.A.’s detention and interrogation program is the most comprehensive review of the brutal treatment of Al Qaeda prisoners.

headline.seo: Senate Panel Approves Findings on Prisoner Interrogations
headline.main: Senate Panel Approves Findings Critical of Detainee Interrogations
headline.print_headline: Senate Panel Approves Findings On Prisoners
